    • Method Detail

      • createDatasource

        public static javax.sql.DataSource createDatasource(BundleContext bc,
                                                    java.lang.String url)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Look up a datasource from the url. The datasource can be passed either as jndi name or bundles ldap filter.
        Parameters:
        bc - the bundle context.
        url - the datasource URL.
        Returns:
        the DataSource object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case of datasource creation failure.
